metadata.title: CVE-2017-14228 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - low
metadata.description:
In Netwide Assembler (NASM) 2.14rc0, there is an illegal address access inthe function paste_tokens() in preproc.c, aka a NULL pointer dereference.It will lead to remote denial of service.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-14228` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

nasm - 2.13.02-0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: nasm package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.13.02-0.1').
